title: Made to be...Submissive
description: After the accident, 40 year old Kathryn Moreland was reconstructed to be prettier, stronger, and sexier than ever. There's just one hitch: the mysterious Dr. Steyn has also designed her to be completely subservient to the first worthy man to claim her. Now she's fallen into the eager hands of 21 year old Zach Jordan, the son of an old friend...and he's going to take full, delightful advantage of the newly submissive and oh-so-willing cougar.
author: Mecha Dahl
